column4: Guys, I need help....I keep having to do sudo modprobe i8k and it won't save it
all because I patched my kernel
I thought you did the modprobe thing for your wifi card. has your wifi card ever worked?
ok.. you need the madwifi drivers.
yes, it did work before I patched that kernel
you have to get madwifi into your homebrew kernel somehow
but I cannot tell you how. I just read somewhere that atheros use madwifi.
what made you compile your own kernel?
agh.. that much work for a sucky way to control your mouse. :) When I had the same problem I bought a tiny optical travel mouse.
and disabled the touchpad in bios
the funnier thing is every thing was working fine I just wanted the extra features.....
if I do the wifi thing....will I lose my alps driver?

you just add. But I am not sure if madwifi is included in the kernel source. check madwifi.sourceforge.net or something. maybe you can just download and "make install" the drivers on your running kernel
you can try asking at #madwifi irc channel here on freenode too.
